name: e-Nigma
description:
e-Nigma - It is a social game in which participants are faced with mysterious and intriguing challenges. With cunning and dark stories (some even real - believe me!).

In this game, you and your friends will come across the strangest riddles you've ever seen. To solve them, players will need to prove their skills as detectives.

The stories are designed in a way that encourages players to think outside the box, analyzing facts in an abstract way.

PLEASE NOTE: THIS GAME MUST BE PLAYED IN A GROUP. NOT RECOMMENDED FOR UNDER 12 YEARS.

HOW TO PLAY

1 - A player chooses a case at random, reads the riddle and the solution to himself, transmitting only the case to the other players;

2 - From there the other players start the questions, which can be asked in any order and by whoever wants to. There is only one rule: players must formulate their questions in such a way that the person who knows the whole case can only answer “yes”, “no” or “irrelevant”, when the answer will not help at all;

3 - The questions, sooner or later, will lead players to discover the rest of the e-Nigma. When the Storyteller considers that the story has been resolved satisfactorily, he can complete the game and read the complete solution. It's up to the narrator to give some clues if the story is at an impasse.

NOTE: The answer of the solution does not have to be given literally.
